benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/paymentMethods - Add a payment method

covered: POST Valid Payload: Multiple success paths (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC06, TC07, TC08, TC10, TC11) returning 201 with JSON PaymentMethod and Location header per story.
Query Parameters: isDefault, payAllUnpaidInvoices, controlPluginName (multi), pluginProperty, and combined usage covered; unexpected param ignored (TC02–TC04, TC08, TC09).
Headers: Required X-Killbill-CreatedBy enforced (TC16); optional X-Killbill-Reason and X-Killbill-Comment handled (TC05).
Error Scenarios per story: 400 for malformed body/missing fields/invalid accountId format (TC12, TC13, TC14, TC16), 404 for non-existent account (TC15).
Validation/Security: Input hardening via SQLi/XSS attempts rejected (TC19, TC20).
Server Error Handling: 500 on plugin inconsistency (TC27); 503 on plugin service down (TC18).
Resilience/Retry/Concurrency: Network failure and retry safety (TC21); concurrent POSTs without duplicates (TC23).
Performance/Timeouts: Explicit latency targets and timeout behavior (TC22, TC28, TC29).
Integration Behavior: Control plugins invoked and downstream sync verified (TC04, TC26).
Backward Compatibility: Older client payload supported (TC25).
gaps: Duplicate submission semantics not explicitly verified (same payload re-post without network error) for idempotency or 409 conflict handling.
Media type/content negotiation not tested (e.g., missing/incorrect Content-Type -> 415; invalid Accept header).
Query param negative validation gaps: non-boolean values for isDefault/payAllUnpaidInvoices; malformed pluginProperty formats; unknown controlPluginName behavior.
Response headers not fully validated (e.g., Content-Type: application/json on 201/4xx/5xx).
Authorization granularity: 403 Forbidden (valid token without required permissions/role) not covered; only 401 is tested.
Audit trail verification not asserted via retrieval (ensuring CreatedBy/Reason/Comment appear in audit/audit logs).
Default-switching behavior not asserted when setting isDefault=true on an account that already has a default (previous default becomes non-default).
Behavior when payAllUnpaidInvoices=true and payments fail partially not covered (creation should still be 201; verify invoice payment attempts/outcomes).
JSON body robustness: unknown/extra fields handling (ignore vs reject) not tested; null vs missing fields differentiation.
Location header follow-up not validated by a GET to the returned URL to confirm the resource is retrievable.
recommendations: Add an explicit idempotency/duplicate submission test: send the same POST twice (with and without any supported idempotency key) and assert desired behavior (201+single resource or 409/200).
Add media type tests: POST with Content-Type=text/plain and missing Content-Type to expect 415; invalid Accept header handling.
Add negative query param tests: isDefault=abc, payAllUnpaidInvoices=1/abc -> 400; unknown controlPluginName -> defined behavior (400/422/503); malformed pluginProperty parsing.
Assert response headers: Content-Type application/json for success and error responses; verify Location format conforms to the resource URL.
Add authorization/permissions test for 403 Forbidden (valid token lacking scope/role).
Verify audit: after creation with CreatedBy/Reason/Comment, call audit/history endpoint or GET to confirm fields recorded as expected.
Test default transition: when isDefault=true on an account with an existing default, verify previous default is unset and new one is active.
Cover payAllUnpaidInvoices failure semantics: simulate declines/partial failures and assert creation still returns 201 and invoice payment attempts are logged/marked accordingly.
Test JSON body with extra/unknown fields and nulls: confirm whether they are ignored or rejected per schema; include wrong data types to ensure 400.
Follow the Location header with a GET to ensure the created PaymentMethod is retrievable and matches the response body.
